title: Understanding Molecular Geometry
text: Look at the central atom and the arrangement of atoms around it. How many atoms are bonded to the central atom, and are there any lone pairs?

title: Identifying Polar Bonds
text: Consider the electronegativity difference between the atoms. Are there any bonds where the electronegativity difference is significant?

title: Determining Overall Polarity
text: Think about the symmetry of the molecule. Does the molecular shape allow for the dipoles to cancel out, or do they add up to create a net dipole moment?
